summary: Two petty thieves get more than they bargained for when they decide to go for one big job to fund their dream trip to Amsterdam.
cast: Mirto Alikaki|Vangelis Alexandris|Petros Lagoutis|Makis Papadimitratos|Eleftheria Gerofoka|Vangelis Besis|Giorgos Divanis|Vasilis Giakoumaros|Dimitris Kapetanakos|Dimitris Koralis|Reggina Mandilari|Miltos Ntzounis|Sofia Panagou|Panagiotis Papadimitratos|Nikos Papadothomakos|Giorgos Pergantos|Christina Stefanidi|Aggeliki Syrma|Xeni Taze|Theano Timiadou|Dimitris Timpilis|Giannis Trimis|Nikos Tselios|Katerina Voudouri|Konstantinos Siradakis
title: Kleftes
